name: Staff of Rigor
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Staves/Staff of Rigor

Construction.Requirements: Craft Staff, align weapon, bane, cause fear, command, magic weapon

sections.body:
This iron-shod black wood staff allows use of the following spells:

  • bane (1 charge)
  • cause fear (1 charge)
  • command (1 charge)
  • magic weapon (1 charge)
  • align weapon (2 charges)
